General.Name: Zhejiang Tianyu Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Tianyu Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of pharmaceutical intermediates and APIs in China and internationally. The company offers pharmaceutical intermediates and APIs of cardiovascular, anti-diabetic, anti-atherosclerosis, anticoagulant, and anti-asthmatic series. It provides fine chemicals and CDMO services. Zhejiang Tianyu Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Taizhou, China.
General.Address: Huangyan Jiangkou Chemical Dev Zn, Taizhou, China, 318020
